review: Dilt-XR (diltiazem):I was told I  have a-fib but I only felt the bad ones. When THEY HIT IT SCARES ME BUT but in the hospital with a 33 hour AFIB MODE, it stopped when they gave me Cardizam.Now I only get mild very short attacks that I can feel. So soon, in 3 weeks I'm asking for a higher dose.It lets me live a normal life at age 77
